import Humidity from "../imgs/humidity.png"; import Wind from "../imgs/wind.png"; const Card = ({weatherData}) => { return (

{weatherData.name}

{weatherData.main.temp} C

{weatherData.main.humidity}
Humidity
{weatherData.wind.speed}/hr
Wind
); }; export default Card;
